intro1.message: Welcome to the finest shop in all of La Harpar!
intro1.opt1: Isn't this the only shop in town?

intro2.message: Well, yes... and that is exactly what makes it the best!
intro2.opt1: Fair point. What are you selling?

intro3.message: All sorts of goods! Materials, food, equipment, and any essentials you might need during your travels.
intro3.opt1: Let's see what you've got then.

default.opt1: Your basement is officially rat-free. I think I need a bath, though.
default.opt3: Tell me a bit about yourself.
default.opt4: What can you tell me about La Harpar?
default.opt5: Are there any people here I should meet?
default.opt6: Do you need help with anything?

aboutMe.message: I'm La Harpar's most charismatic trader! Born and raised right here in this village.
aboutMe.opt1: What's it like living here? Anything interesting to do?
aboutMe.opt2: You must know everyone in town, then?

aboutLiving.message: It's a quiet life, mostly. Other than the crab infestation on the beach. I heard Josh is looking for someone to help thin them out.

aboutVillage.message: La Harpar is the largest fish exporter in Port Stocksmar. Our fishermen are famous across all four regions, aye.

aboutFishermen.message: Our waters hold the highest quality fish, and our fishermen are experts with decades of experience. This village has been a vital partner to North Lirold for a long time.
aboutFishermen.opt1: So the fish are doing all the heavy lifting? I see.

aboutFishQuality.message: The quality of the fish is vital, of course, but it takes a great deal of skill to catch and prepare them properly!
aboutFishQuality.opt1: Fair enough. Let me ask you something else.

aboutPeople.message: There's Josh at the tavern; he's a good soul but leans a bit too hard on the bottle. The bartender is always swamped, so he's likely looking for help. And Marvin just returned from an expedition—you'll find him near the guild.

aboutGuild.message: The Exploration Guild. It's the main hub for local adventurers. You should pay them a visit; they'll help you get prepared for the road.
aboutGuild.opt2: I don't need a guild. I can handle myself just fine.

aboutDanger.message: Confident, aye? I like that. Just stay sharp—the wildlife around here can be quite unforgiving.

questOffer.message: Actually, aye. I've got a nasty rat problem in the basement. Clear them out for me, and I'll make sure it's worth your while.
questOffer.opt2: No thanks. I don't do basements.

questCompleted.message: No help needed at the moment! I'm busy moving my merchandise back into the cellar.
